titles: The Countesse of Pembrokes Arcadia. Written by Sir Philip Sidney Knight. Now since the first edition augmented and ended
author: Sidney, Philip, Sir, 1554-1586.
Sanford, Hugh, d. 1607.
publisher: Printed [by John Windet] for William Ponsonbie,
notes: Editor's note "To the reader" signed: H.S., i.e. Hugh Sanford.
